The sound quality is good. They actually fit nicely in your ear , not at all uncomfortable . The battery backup is good too . Sometimes if you're laying down , the sensor can be touched by things around you so that pauses the music or changes the modes so you have to take care of that. The in ear detection works nicely and accurately, it may seem a bit slow like some milliseconds but it shouldn't be a problem. Overall a value for money product!!!

Not too loud. Spatial audio enables loudness and a bit of spatial effect. Otherwise the connectivity is good, the sound is good, and the hearable application works well. No complaints as of now. Good value for money product!
